introduction: Log in to your HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC) online account and send (file) your tax return or get help with lost usernames, passwords and account activation codes.
more_information:
You can't use this service: 

+ if you haven't [registered for Self Assessment](/register-for-self-assessment "Register for Self Assessment")
+ to send certain tax returns - eg [partnership returns](/how-to-send-self-assessment-online/software-you-can-buy "When you need extra software to send your tax return") (because you need extra software to send this to HMRC) 

*[HMRC]: HM Revenue & Customs
overview: Tax return - log in and file (send) your Self Assessment tax return online and get help with lost username, password or account activation codes
title: Log in and file your Self Assessment tax return
